libsource.description: ESP32-C3-WROOM-02 is a general-purpose Wi-Fi and Bluetooth LE module. This module features a rich set of peripherals and high performance, which makes it an ideal choice for smart home, industrial automation, health care, consumer electronics, etc.

ESP32-C3-WROOM-02 is a general-purpose Wi-Fi and Bluetooth LE module. This module features a rich set of peripherals and high performance, which makes it an ideal choice for smart home, industrial automation, health care, consumer electronics, etc.
